    • Method Detail

      • writeValuesToImage

        public static void writeValuesToImage(double[][] values,
                                      String filename,
                                      int classes,
                                      ColorScheme color)
        Writes values from matrix to a grayscale png image. Dimensions of image is same as dimensions of matrix. Values of matrix should be in range of given classes (0 - amount of classes). Note, the values in matrix must be classified for getting correct colour from given colour scheme.
        Parameters:
        values - matrix to write
        filename - filename of created image, for example "grayscale.png"
        classes - how many different classes are in matrix of values
        color - ColorScheme Color scheme to use

      • writeValuesToImage

        public static void writeValuesToImage(double[][] values,
                                      MyArrayList<Point> points,
                                      String filename,
                                      int classes,
                                      ColorScheme color)
        Writes values from matrix to a png image. Adds points and weights of them as overlay to written matrix. Dimensions of image is same as dimensions of matrix. Values of matrix should be in range of given classes (0 to amount of classes). Note, the values in matrix must be classified for getting correct colour from given colour scheme.
        Parameters:
        values - matrix to write
        points - list of points to add
        filename - filename of created image, for example "interpolated.png"
        classes - how many different classes are in matrix of values
        color - ColorScheme Color scheme to use

      • writeTrianglesToImage

        public static void writeTrianglesToImage(int width,
                                         int height,
                                         MyHashSet<Triangle> triangles,
                                         String fileName)
        Draws given set of Triangle to a image.
        Parameters:
        width - width of created image
        height - height of created image
        triangles - set of triangles
        fileName - filename of created image, for example "triangles.png"
